abstract: The investment bank Perella Weinberg Partners has been called in to mediate as Morgan Stanley wrangles with Citigroup over how to value a unit they jointly own, Morgan Stanley Smith Barney.
snippet: The investment bank Perella Weinberg Partners has been called in to mediate as Morgan Stanley wrangles with Citigroup over how to value a unit they jointly own, Morgan Stanley Smith Barney.
lead_paragraph: Brokerage firms were once the bread and butter of Wall Street. Still, a recent conflict between Morgan Stanley and Citigroup has exposed just how hard it is for even experienced hands in the business to quantify the value of such operations.

headline.main: In Spat Between Citigroup and Morgan Stanley, Appraisers Are Called In

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Peter Eavis
